comments.html:
> Annonying audio quality with interruptions and glitches.

Nothing I can do about that 🤷‍♂️. Fortunately, we can stop watching stuff at any time.

> Content was nothing new to me.

So glad to hear that. Hope you also implemented it and made your part of the Internet a bit safer.
